ygData.subject: Re: About Int.........
ygData.msgSnippet: ... change ... of ... Intelligence has NOTHING to do with your melee skills, or your Shaman capabilties. Dexterity is what will influence how fast you can
ygData.messageBody:
> Does the Dif. between an intel. of 60 and that of 57 make any
change
> in how well I Learn skills with use? If so then I have a great set
of
> arms that a spell slinger can use on the server I am on and if not
> then how high do I need to raise my Intel to learn quicker?
>
> Thanks..
>
> Frezslice
> Bar. Shaman of the
> 12th Circle
> unguilded as yet ...:)


Intelligence has NOTHING to do with your melee skills, or your Shaman
capabilties. Dexterity is what will influence how fast you can learn
your spear. Intelligence in itself may affect how well you learn your
tradeskills, but that is a subject that has been in debat eof rages
and still is now.

Good luck.
